annotations.description: If you liked the bartender's kit for Mixology and Craft and or need one and or want to make a sweet gift for Christmas... Here's the link https://www.mixolog...
annotations.title: The Right Word - A delicious gin drink, cousin of the Last Word and the Corpse Reviver No.2

textContent:
1 oz Gin
1oz St-Germain
1oz Lillet Blanc
1oz Frsh lime juice

Shake all ingredients with ice (dry shake if you want a thicker foam)
Fine strain into a chilled cocktail coupe
Garnish with fresh basil sprig

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8nh5EYIZGH4
title: The Right Word
